form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Birth Certificate of Aldo Henry Pierre

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 LIBERTY EQUALITY FRATERNITY REPUBLIC OF HAITI Excerpt of the Registry of Birth Certificates for the commune of Petion-Ville deposed at the National Archives YEAR 1945 of the Republic. PAGE 23 NUMBER 68 A2 No. 89441 In the year nineteen hundred and fourty five the 142nd of our Independence and on Saturday June twenty third at BIRTH CERTIFI- one o'clock in the afternoon. Before me, LUDERS D. CATE OF : DUPLESSY, undersigned, Civil Registrar of Petion-Ville. ALDO HENRY Appeared Mr. ALPHONSE MARRA, adult, domiciled in Petion- PIERRE Ville. Who brought forth a male child whom he declared to be his son, To which child, he has given the first names of: ALDO HENRY PIERRE, born on June fifteen of the current year at two o'clock in the morning from Mrs. ALPHONSE MARRA, nee PHILOMENE SHETTINI, adult, domiciled at the same place. This act was drawn up in the presence of Eugene Vieux, and Camille Duchatelier, adults, and domiciled in the same town. After reading the present act, we have signed it with the parties. Port-au-Prince March 7th, 1990 Certified true copy. Collationned ANHA/ 422734 JEAN WILFRID BERTRAND GENERAL DIRECTOR Only for the legalization of the signature of M. Jean Wilfrid BERTRAND General Director of the National Archives Receipt No. 65233HH. Public Prosecutor's office, this 15th day of March 1990. Me. Arthur Gerard Delbeau, lawyer Commissioner for the Government I, Martine Joseph, certify this to be a correct translation of the original document in French, to the best of my understanding and belief. Translator
